requirements.question: Watch an anime that combines your favourite and least favourite genre
Watch an anime that was recommended to you by another AniList user
Watch an anime with a number in the title
Watch an anime that aired this year
Watch an anime with less than 12 episodes
Finish watching an anime on your Dropped list
Watch an anime from the recently reviewed section of AniList
Watch an anime with a mean score below 70%
Watch an anime with a mean score above 80%
Watch an anime with a one word title
Watch an anime that another Beginner’s Challenge participant has scored 90/100 or 9/10
Watch an anime from an AWC Staff member’s favourites
Watch an anime listed as a Sequel, Spin Off or Alternative to an anime you have completed
Watch an anime with one of your favourite voice actors or staff members
Watch an anime by one of your favourite studios or producers
Watch an anime that aired during any Winter season
Watch an anime that does not have any of the top 3 genres listed in your Genre Overview
Watch an anime with the source “Original”
Watch an anime with a title that begins with the last letter of your username
Watch an anime with format “TV Short”
